name: Neco Drop 2
storyline: You wake up realizing you have been transformed into a cat. You are then greeted by a police cat that think you seem suspicious, who escorts you into town. You then realize that the world you woke up in is run by cats. An older cat recognize that you are from another world run by humans and tells you that if you befriend every single cat in town, you just might be able to return to your human form, and human world.
summary:
Launched in April Fool's 2021. Neco Drop 2 is a sequel to the 2020 April Fool's game Neco Drop: Cat Friends Nation. The Game is a tie-in to Street Fighter V and was hosted on the Street Fighter V homepage. All Characters in the game are cats based on Street Fighter V characters. 
 
The gameplay is very similar to Bejewelled or other versions of "SameGame". You get a set number of blocks to remove, you then click one of the tiles and all the connected tiles of the same colour disappear. If you clear the specified amount of tiles within the turn limit, you win. If you lose you can bet on a pre-recorded Street Fighter V match to win more turns.
